message: OK, specifically, I'm wondering if there is a way I can do something like "mark all files that end in .txt" so that I can delete all of them. Any thoughts?

For a tip, I love "M-x wdired-change-to-wdired-mode" which lets you edit the file names in place. So you can enable that mode and then modify the names using rectangle editing or whatever else you like about emacs.
